title: Huge question about Bandle City and yordles

replies.body: As far as we know, it' s mostly purple.

> [{quoted}](name=Decrit,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=FmRuAnJA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-12T14:31:49.193+0000)
>
> As far as we know, it' s mostly purple.

If [Caitlyn's traps](http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/champions/caitlyn/#spell-CaitlynYordleTrap) are to be believed, they have a weakness for cupcakes, too.

(Note, I've no idea if lore Caitlyn knows about yordles, hunts yordles, or if it's like saying you've got a truck that can withstand a bigfoot attack.)
So... plenty of bakers? I always had the idea of patties were a big thing in Bandle City for some reason. I'll take it (and the cupcake too)

You know that actually brings up an interesting thing. If yordles are these pseudo-mystic Sidhe style fae things that alter perception and reveal themselves to civilization as we get with Poppy and Kled what the hell is Caitlyn doing trying to trap them?  Why would cupcakes be involved?

"trapped enemies take an additional 30/70/110/150/190 **(+0)** increased damage from Headshot. "

wot
Lol I thought it said Astronomy and I read the comments and got really confused as to why the stars were purple
According to Kled, anything and everything is on the menu.
